name: Artillery Cats
description: Artillery Cats is a 2-8 player party battle game based off the old classic 'Bomberman'. Battle it out with your friends using unique cats with their own special abilities (More cats to come) on 4 different styles of maps each having a 4 or 8 player version.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space
